title: HomeGoods Is Selling the Most Adorable “Disco Pumpkins” for Fall
description: This glittery seasonal find will brighten up any space. READ MORE...
author: Ashia Aubourg
excerpt: This glittery seasonal find will brighten up any space.
text: DecoratingDecor & AccessoriesShoppingWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: Eric Glenn/ShutterstockWhen spooky season rolls around, stores stock their shelves with the classic color scheme: orange, black, and maybe purple if they’re really thinking outside the box. This year, shoppers are running to HomeGoods to get their hands on a find that stands out from the rest: a bright disco pumpkin. These pumpkins are ideal for people who adore Halloween but want to lean on a retro-core aesthetic.You’ll find these mirror mosaic-studded pumpkins at HomeGoods or T.J. Maxx for only $12.99. This disco Halloween find takes up a mere 6 and a half inches in diameter, so you can nestle it on your countertop or make it the centerpiece of your dining table. They mimic the classic ball, with a bright silver color and a subtle iridescence whenever it comes into contact with light. If you want to go wild with the theme, you can also pick up one of these disco ghost-shaped soap dispensers from T.J. Maxx to sit on your kitchen sink. They’re about 8 inches tall, on par with a small bottle of Dawn dish soap. Shoppers can’t wait to get their hands on this disco pumpkin to brighten their kitchen, writing how “sophisticated” the find is. One user went as far as to comment, “You left the disco pumpkin,” questioning the account’s sanity because this Halloween decorative item is that special.
html:
• Decorating
  • Decor & Accessories
  • Shopping

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

When spooky season rolls around, stores stock their shelves with the classic color scheme: orange, black, and maybe purple if they’re really thinking outside the box. This year, shoppers are running to HomeGoods to get their hands on a find that stands out from the rest: a bright disco pumpkin. These pumpkins are ideal for people who adore Halloween but want to lean on a retro-core aesthetic.

You’ll find these mirror mosaic-studded pumpkins at HomeGoods or T.J. Maxx for only $12.99. This disco Halloween find takes up a mere 6 and a half inches in diameter, so you can nestle it on your countertop or make it the centerpiece of your dining table. They mimic the classic ball, with a bright silver color and a subtle iridescence whenever it comes into contact with light. 

If you want to go wild with the theme, you can also pick up one of these disco ghost-shaped soap dispensers from T.J. Maxx to sit on your kitchen sink. They’re about 8 inches tall, on par with a small bottle of Dawn dish soap. 

Shoppers can’t wait to get their hands on this disco pumpkin to brighten their kitchen, writing how “sophisticated” the find is. One user went as far as to comment, “You left the disco pumpkin,” questioning the account’s sanity because this Halloween decorative item is that special.
